"The Nanny" stars Daphne Rubinstein as the titular character, Jennifer Tilly as Nanny Fran, and Michael Pena as Dr. Nicky Kellett.
The show follows the life of a new nanny who is hired by a wealthy family to take care of their children after the death of the former nanny.
The story of "The Nanny" revolves around the challenges faced by the new nanny in her efforts to maintain order and discipline among the children, while also dealing with conflicts and misunderstandings with other members of the household.
